summary: Diff adds a new single-page landing page composed of Hero, Problem, How It Works, Features, Pricing, Final CTA sections on the main App route, with on-page smooth scrolling from Hero CTAs. Several visual/animation requirements (global dark gradient background, glassmorphism/glow CSS implementation, and scroll reveal behavior) are referenced via class names/hooks but are not evidenced in the provided diff summary, so their completion cannot be confirmed from this truncated view. Additional unrequested elements (Footer with external links and an Internet Identity actor hook) were added.

Without CSS/theme files in the visible diff, the required theme cannot be verified as implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement smooth fade-in scroll animations for major sections and subtle hover glow effects for interactive elements (buttons, cards, links), including visible focus states.
